section1.intro: Hello! My name is Chris Ngabala, I'm 20 years old, and I'm a developer in the web and digital field.

section2.title: My Journey
section2.content:
My journey began at the Multimedia School, where I received a solid foundation in programming and web development.

 In my first year, I learned the essential basics of coding, laying the groundwork for my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

 Thanks to this foundation, I was able to tackle more complex and advanced concepts in my second year.

section3.title: My Expertise
section3.content:
In my second year, I significantly expanded my skills by exploring a variety of technologies and frameworks, allowing me to develop more complex projects:

 - Back-End: PHP, MySQL, Symfony, and SQLite for backend development, including serverless solutions like Firebase.

 - Front-End: React/Native, TypeScript, Node.js for frontend development.

section4.title: Goals and Aspirations
section4.content:
I am currently looking for an apprenticeship available immediately, with a schedule of 1 week in classes and 3 weeks in the company, in preparation for my third year at Yutopia Meta Campus Paris. 

 I am particularly motivated by opportunities that will allow me to work on innovative and stimulating projects while continuing to develop my skills as a Fullstack developer. Please feel free to contact me by message or phone through my contact page.
